<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List user's wallets.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/operations/wallets"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a list of user's wallets. You can include any of the filter parameters below to refine your search.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"owner","required":false,"in":"query","description":"User wallet owner type.","schema":{"enum":["USER","OTHER"],"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

The wallets returned successfully.
